name: Local Binary Pattern (LBP) Analysis
description: Extracts micro-texture descriptors using LBP operators. AI-generated images produce distinct LBP histogram distributions compared to natural photographs.

references.title: Ojala, T. et al. (2002). Multiresolution Gray-Scale and Rotation Invariant Texture Classification with LBP. IEEE TPAMI.
Nataraj, L. et al. (2019). Detecting GAN Generated Fake Images using Co-occurrence Matrices. Electronic Imaging.
